channel.title: The Unexplained with Howard Hughes
channel.itunes:subtitle: www.theunexplained.tv
channel.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
channel.itunes:summary: Join Howard Hughes as he explores the world of the unexplained, live from London Howard has been in conversation with some of the world's most renown mediums and paranormal investigators, more information is available on The Unexplained website - www.theunexplained.tv where you can join the mailing list, contact Howard and more!
channel.description: Join Howard Hughes as he explores the world of the unexplained, live from London Howard has been in conversation with some of the world's most renown mediums and paranormal investigators, more information is available on The Unexplained website - www.theunexplained.tv where you can join the mailing list, contact Howard and more!

item.title: The Unexplained 81 - Erlendur Haraldsson
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to Erlendur Haraldsson...
item.itunes:summary: This edition features one of the worlds best known paranormal and parapsychology investigators, Icelander Erlendur Haraldsson. His exhaustive research on apparitions and the people who report them is detailed in his book The Departed Among The Living.

item.title: The Unexplained 80 - Mayan Calendar
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to Dr Carl Johan Calleman...
item.itunes:summary: The show returns with world expert on the Mayan Calendar – Dr Carl Johan Calleman. Does the Calendar really predict the end of civilization as we know at the end of 2012? And what else is it telling us about life on this planet?

item.title: The Unexplained 79 - Turin Shroud Update
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to Thomas de Wesselow...
item.itunes:summary: This edition features British researcher Thomas de Wesselow who has made headlines in the UK this week with his new book on the Turin Shroud The Sign. You may have thought you had heard all there is to be said about it – you have not!

item.title: The Unexplained 78 - Ian Shircore
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to Ian Shircore...
item.itunes:summary: This edition features British investigative journalist Ian Shircore who has looked into not one but scores of the biggest conspiracy theories. They include whether the Duke of Edinburgh is a shape-shifting lizard, the deaths of Marilyn Monroe, Princess Diana and Pope John-Paul 1.

item.title: The Unexplained 77 - Thomas P Fusco
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to Thomas P Fusco...
item.itunes:summary: This time we talk with Tom Fusco in Florida - he says he is come up with a fascinating scientific theory that links together and explains all paranormal phenomena...

item.title: The Unexplained 76 - The Keiser Report
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to Max Keiser...
item.itunes:summary:
This show features the highly controversial thoughts of Max Keiser – broadcaster, entrepreneur and host of The Keiser Report on RT (Russia Today Television) from Moscow. The views expressed are those of Max and not necessarily those of The Unexplained.
Apologies for some slight "breakup" on the digital connection to Paris in this edition...

item.title: The Unexplained 75 - David Icke
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to David Icke...
item.itunes:summary: This time we talk to highly compelling and very controversial writer and speaker David Icke about 2012 and what might happen to our world this year - and we look back on what David thinks are the causes of the amazing global events of 2011.

item.title: The Unexplained 75 - David Icke
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to David Icke...
item.itunes:summary: This time we talk to highly compelling and very controversial writer and speaker David Icke about 2012 and what might happen to our world this year - and we look back on what David thinks are the causes of the amazing global events of 2011.

item.title: The Unexplained 74 - UFOs In Wartime
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to Mack Maloney...
item.itunes:summary: Howard talks with American author Mack Maloney who has written UFOs – in Wartime – What They Didnt Want You To Know. Mack is a journalist who once worked as a Press Officer for one of the biggest companies in the world and his research is fascinating and extensive.

item.title: The Unexplained Winter Message 2011
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes 2010 Winter Message
item.itunes:summary: Winter Message from Howard Hughes, December 2011.

item.title: The Unexplained 73 - Bigfoot
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to Jeff Hilling...
item.itunes:summary: US investigator Jeff Hilling about the world’s most notorious and controversial sighting of Bigfoot…

item.title: The Unexplained 72 - The Enfield Poltergeist
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to Guy Lion Playfair...
item.itunes:summary: This time we talk with London based Author Guy Lyon Playfair who investigated one of the worlds longest and most intense paranormal cases – The Enfield Poltergeist. Guy even spent time living with the family whose lives were – literally – turned upside down by it.

item.title: The Unexplained 71 - Graham Nicholls
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to Graham Nicholls...
item.itunes:summary: This Edition features British Out of the Body Experience expert Graham Nicholls – who lives and works in Estonia. If you have ever wanted to know more about OBE phenomena be sure to check out his website...

item.title: The Unexplained 70 - Gerard Aartsen
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to Gerard Aartsen...
item.itunes:summary: Gerard Aartsen has a unique take on the tieups between ETs and the current political and financial instability...

item.title: The Unexplained 69 - Ghosts and Hauntings
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to Rupert Matthews...
item.itunes:summary: Edition 69 comes direct from what is claimed to be the most haunted place in Britain – Hampton Court Palace near London... We talk to ghost researcher and author of new book Haunted Surrey, Rupert Matthews.

item.title: The Unexplained 68 - Al Bielek
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to Al Bielek...
item.itunes:summary: Hear archive audio unearthed and remastered with Al Bielek from The Philadelphia Experiment...

item.title: The Unexplained 67 - 911 Special
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to researcher Jim Fetzer...
item.itunes:summary: On the tenth anniversary of the tragic events we speak with controversial 9/11 Researcher Jim Fetzer.

item.title: The Unexplained 66 - Whitley Strieber
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to author and broadcaster Whitley Strieber...
item.itunes:summary: As Hurricane Irene bears down on the U.S. Eastern Seaboard – we speak with the creator of climate disaster movie The Day After Tomorrow world-renowned visionary, author and broadcaster Whitley Strieber.

item.title: The Unexplained 65 - Micah Hanks
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to UFO researcher Micah Hanks...
item.itunes:summary: This Edition features American UFO Researcher Micah Hanks - one of the authors in the new book Exposed, Uncovered and Declassified - UFOs and Aliens from new Page Books...

item.title: The Unexplained Special Edition - UK Riots
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to politics professorJustin Fisher...
item.itunes:summary: This is an interview with respected Politics Professor Justin Fisher - at the Brunel University London... about the looting and rioting that hit London within the past week...

item.title: The Unexplained 64 - Richard C Hoagland
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to space expert Richard C Hoagland...
item.itunes:summary: This time a Special – the return of US space expert Richard C Hoagland he will be coming to the UK with some stunning new work – hear about it here first!

item.title: The Unexplained 63 - Howard Hughes
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Hear a very special take on the secret life of Billionaire Howard Hughes…
item.itunes:summary: Hear a very special take on the secret life of Billionaire Howard Hughes…

item.title: The Unexplained 62 - Jim Moroney
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to serial abductee Jim Moroney...
item.itunes:summary: This show features Canadian serial abductee Jim Moroney - who is featured in a new book about UFOs and contact… Hear Jims take on why the aliens take some of us - perhaps more of us than we know...

item.title: The Unexplained 61 - Mark L Cowden
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to Mark L Cowden...
item.itunes:summary: This amazing show features a conversation with American-born Belfast-based audio-visual technician Mark L Cowden who recorded what is claimed to be the first full two-way conversation between spirits and humans...

item.title: The Unexplained 60 - Nick Redfern
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to UFO researcher Nick Redfern...
item.itunes:summary: The Unexplained returns with an all-new show featuring UK-born Texas-based anomalist Nick Redfern. Nick has done painstaking research into UFOs and other strange phenomena – and now has a book out about the real-life Men in Black!

item.title: The Unexplained 59 - Helen Morrison
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to serial and mass killing expert Helen Morrison...
item.itunes:summary: This edition features Chicago-based serial and mass killing expert Helen Morrison. A year on from the gun-sprees of British men Derrick Bird and Raoul Moat we discuss those cases - and infamous serial killers Peter Sutcliffe - The Yorkshire Ripper and Fred and Rose West.

item.title: The Unexplained 58 - Wendy Brown
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to feature author Wendy Brown...
item.itunes:summary: This time we feature author, Wendy Brown from Maine, USA – author of Surviving the Apocalypse in the Suburbs, confronting an issue many of us may have to face – what to do should there be a natural or man-made calamity and we have to fend for ourselves.

item.title: The Unexplained 57 - Uri Geller
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to Uri Geller...
item.itunes:summary: This show features a man who calls himself The Mystifier. Uri Gellers travelling the planet with his hit television series... but we caught up with him in a break from the latest live series – for Swedens Kanal 5.

item.title: The Unexplained 56 - Alan Wolf
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to physicist Alan Wolf...
item.itunes:summary: This Edition takes you into the amazing world of accomplished San Francisco physicist and philosopher Fred Alan Wolf.

item.title: The Unexplained 55 - Richard Guy
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to engineer Richard Guy...
item.itunes:summary: This show features New York based structural engineer Richard Guy, who has an interesting theory on the earth’s expansion.

item.title: The Unexplained 54 - Nick Pope
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to UFO investigator Nick Pope...
item.itunes:summary: Another Unexplained Exclusive Interview - This edition features British UFO investigator Nick Pope - who used to collate the UKs UFO reports for the Ministry of Defence in London.

item.title: The Unexplained 53 - Dr Edgar Mitchell
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to Dr Edgar Mitchell...
item.itunes:summary: In 1971, Dr Edgar Mitchell of Apollo 14 became the sixth man to walk on the Moon... Listen to Edgar in conversation with Howard Hughes now!

item.title: The Unexplained 52 - The Merlin Project
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to the co-founder of The Merlin Project...
item.itunes:summary: A welcome return to co-founder of The Merlin Project, hear how they created a way of highlighting future trends based on the past.

item.title: The Unexplained 51 - Gerald Celente
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to trendmaster Gerald Celente...
item.itunes:summary: This time – as 2011 dawns – a return visit from US Trendmaster Gerald Celente – as featured on CNN, “Oprah” and tv and radio outlets worldwide.

item.title: The Unexplained 50 - Special Edition
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: An Unexplained 50th Anniverary Edition
item.itunes:summary: This Special 50th Anniversary Edition trawls the Archives of The Unexplained to bring you some of the material youve asked for over the last few years...

item.title: The Unexplained Winter Message 2010
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes 2010 Winter Message
item.itunes:summary: Winter Message from Howard Hughes, December 2010...

item.title: The Unexplained 49 - UFO Sightings
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to John Hanson and Dawn Holloway...
item.itunes:summary: This Edition showcases the extensive and detailed UFO research by retired Birmingham Policeman John Hanson and his research-partner Dawn Holloway. Hear their amazing and, in many cases, previously-unheard accounts of UK sightings and contacts.

item.title: The Unexplained 48 - Linda Moulton Howe
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to investigative journalist Linda Moulton Howe...
item.itunes:summary: This edition features questing US investigative journalist Linda Moulton Howe. Her work on subjects like alien contact and cattle mutilations has won acclaim and awards. Hear about her latest research on the state of our planet.

item.title: The Unexplained 47 - Kevin Richardson
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to Kevin Richardson...
item.itunes:summary: This show features the remarkable Kevin Richardson in South Africa - known worldwide for his work and close companionship with lions and other dangerous creatures. His insights are breathtaking.

item.title: The Unexplained 46 - David Icke
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to David Icke...
item.itunes:summary: This show features a man youve been asking me to get back on the show for months - David Icke. Davids views about politics, the global economy and who manipulates the reins of power are deeply controversial but always worth hearing.

item.title: The Unexplained 45 - Lorna Byrne
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to Lorna Byrne...
item.itunes:summary: This Edition features a woman who was unknown two and a half years ago and now has a six figure book deal and worldwide interest. Irishwoman Lorna Byrne says all her life shes been able to see Angels. And she says they have given her messages about the future of our planet. Angels in Her Hair is a remarkable story - so is Lorna Byrnes whole life.

item.title: The Unexplained 44 - Heather Couper
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to astronomer Heather Couper...
item.itunes:summary: This show features an old friend - world-famous British Astronomer Heather Couper - Heather talks about her lifes work and her views about life on other planets - including the latest discovery Gliese 581G.

item.title: The Unexplained 43 - Malcolm Robinson
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to paranormal investigator Malcolm Robinson...
item.itunes:summary: This show features Scottish Paranormal writer and investigator Malcolm Robinson. Hear a staggering tale of claimed alien aduction, some amazing UFO stories and very chilling ghost revelations - all told with passion and credibility.

item.title: The Unexplained 42 - Scott Stephens
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to weather expert Scott Stephens...
item.itunes:summary: This Edition features American weather expert Scott Stephens who appeared with Howard on radio a number of times between 2003 and 2006 and then disappeared... He believes our weather is being deliberately tampered with - hear why he vanished and what his latest thoughts are on this show.

item.title: The Unexplained 41 - Michael Tellinger
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to Michael Tellinger...
item.itunes:summary: This Edition features South African Michael Tellinger, an old friend of The Unexplained... Have you ever asked where we came from , who we really are and what we are here to do? Michael believes he has the answers - and , as he starts his US Tour in New York (Aug 26th) he tells us his latest findings.

item.title: The Unexplained 40 - Michael Horn
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to Michael Horn...
item.itunes:summary: This Edition features Michael Horn, US representative of highly controversial alleged Contactee Billy Meier who claims to have received countless prophecies from beings his work has been widely challenged... Now make up your own mind

item.title: The Unexplained 39 - Seth Shostak
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to Seth Shostak...
item.itunes:summary: This Edition features Senior Astronomer Seth Shostak at the Search For Extra-Terrestrial Intelligence Institute - SETI. For more than a quarter of a century it has been scanning the "skies" and radio waves beyond our planet for evidence we may not be alone...

item.title: The Unexplained 38 - Barrie John
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to medium Barrie John...
item.itunes:summary: This Edition features British Medium Barrie John - famous for his stage shows and a string of radio and tv appearances. Barrie is very down to earth - but his work certainly is not!

item.title: The Unexplained 37 - Jacky Newcomb
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to Angel Lady, Jacky Newcomb ...
item.itunes:summary: This Edition is a Special with friend of the show Jacky Newcomb. She is The Angel Lady, as seen on British ITV 1s This Morning show...

item.title: The Unexplained 36 - The Shroud of Turin
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to journalist NigeL Kerner...
item.itunes:summary: Nigel Kerner is an author and journalist best known for work on Aliens and UFOs; but he has just returned from the latest exhibition of The Shroud of Turin at Frascati, Italy - hear his views and thoughts alongside medical doctor Andrew Silverman.

item.title: The Unexplained 35 - ESA Response
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to Oliver Witasse from the European Space Agency...
item.itunes:summary: This is a shortened Edition - Senior European Space Agency man Oliver Witasse replies to Richard Hoaglands statements that Phobos is not natural - and may be some kind of spaceship.

item.title: The Unexplained 34 - Richard C Hoagland
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to space expert Richard C Hoagland ...
item.itunes:summary: This is a world Exclusive with Richard C Hoagland where he has information that more than suggests Europes Space Agency has, and is set to publicly confirm, information proving the Mars moon Phobos is NOT a natural structure!

item.title: The Unexplained 33 - Lynne Kitei
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to Dr Lynne Kitei...
item.itunes:summary: This is an Extended Unexplained Special Edition with Dr Lynne Kitei who was one of the thousands who experienced strange ariel phenomena over Phoenix, Arizona on and around March 13th, 1997.

item.title: The Unexplained 32 -
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to ...
item.itunes:summary: If you want to know whether there will be a terror attack, if we are heading for war and if the economy will nosedive this year you owe it to yourself to hear this show...]

item.title: The Unexplained 31 - Mark Rosney
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to Para-Projects Mark Rosney...
item.itunes:summary: Howard is joined by Mark Rosney from Para-Projects, Mark is one of the authors of A Begginers Guide To Paranormal Investigations.

item.title: The Unexplained Special Edition - Norway Sightings
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to UFO researcher Nick Pope...
item.itunes:summary: Howard is joined by Nick Pope to talk in a special edition of The Unexplained about the mysterious sightins above Norway in December 2009.

item.title: The Unexplained 30 - Fiona Zimmerman
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to Fiona Zimmerman...
item.itunes:summary: Howard is in conversation with Fiona Zimmerman in South Africa...

item.title: The Unexplained 29 - John Lennon
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to author Joe Niezgoda...
item.itunes:summary: This is a special to close out 2009 and enter 2010. American author Joe Niezgoda has written a stunning, highly controversial new book claiming John Lennon made a pact with the Devil...]

item.title: The Unexplained 28 - Nick Pope
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to UFO researcher Nick Pope...
item.itunes:summary: This Edition, the last of 2009, features UFO researcher and ex British Defence Ministry man Nick Pope...

item.title: The Unexplained 27
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes, The Unexplained Edition 27...
item.itunes:summary: After the excitement of the on-location Editions of The Unexplained from The Beyond Knowledge Conference in Liverpool, this show is back in its London base for Edition 27.

item.title: The Unexplained 26 - Beyond Knowledge Conference Part 2
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes is live from the Beyond Knowledge Conference 2009 in Liverpool...
item.itunes:summary: The Unexplained live from Beyond Knowledge 2009, part 2 continues with Ralph Ellis and Peter Robbins.

item.title: The Unexplained 25 - Beyond Knowledge Conference Part 1
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes is live from the Beyond Knowledge Conference 2009 in Liverpool...
item.itunes:summary: The Unexplained live from Beyond Knowledge 2009, part 1 begins with Steve Bassett from the Paradigm Research Group, Nick Pope and Richard C. Hoagland - continues with The Unexplained Edition 26.

item.title: The Unexplained - World Exclusive
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to space expert Richard C Hoagland...
item.itunes:summary: The Unexplained World Exclusive - Richard C Hoagland tells The Unexplained FIRST about his brand new research on Saturn, the Nazis and an amazing form of physics...

item.title: The Unexplained 24
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to Timothy Good, Reg Presley, Uri Geller and James Van Praagh...
item.itunes:summary: The Unexplained Edition 24, Howard talks with Timothy Good, Reg Presley, Uri Gellers and American Medium James Van Praagh!

item.title: The Unexplained 23 - Lunar Special
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: The Unexplained lunar special...
item.itunes:summary: www.theunexplained.tv was officially relaunched on Liverpool's Late Night City on Radio City 96.7 and City Talk 105.9 and with that we have a Lunar special!

item.title: The Unexplained 22 - Dr Eric Pearl
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to healer Dr Eric Pearl...
item.itunes:summary: After many a request The Unexplained speaks to renowned healer Dr Eric Pearl.

item.title: The Unexplained 21 - The Titanic
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to Robin Gardener...
item.itunes:summary: As promised Robin Gardener joins Howard whose book "The Titanic Conspiracy" is about to be published.

item.title: The Unexplained 20 - Psychic Medium Phoebe
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to Liverpool Phsychic Medium Phoebe...
item.itunes:summary: First on The Unexplained is Liverpool Psychic Medium Phoebe who made her name as a guest on Radio City 96.7 and City Talk 105.9s Late Night City with Pete Price.

item.title: The Unexplained 19 - Gerald Celente
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to Gerald Celente...
item.itunes:summary: 2009 begins with a few chilling words from US Trendwatcher Gerald Celente on the prospects of the world's economy then we cross to my recent show which aired across the UK on Citytalk 105.9, based in Liverpool.

item.title: The Unexplained 18
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: The Unexplained Edition 18
item.itunes:summary: So, during August, The Unexplained returned back to the airwaves on one of the UK's biggest talk stations!

item.title: The Unexplained 17 - Christian Dion
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to super-psychic Christian Dion...
item.itunes:summary: Christian Dion British super-psychic joing Howard for this edition, well known on radio and tv in the UK, he now lives in Los Angeles and is psychic to the stars!

item.title: The Unexplained 16 - R Gary Patterson
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to R Gary Patterson...
item.itunes:summary: Old friend of the show R. Gary Patterson joins Howard for a Rock'n'Roll Special, talking about strange coincidences, conspiracy theories, occult stories and more...

item.title: The Unexplained 15 - Michelle Eloff
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to Michelle Eloff...
item.itunes:summary: Top Trance-Voice Channel Michelle Eloff is know around the workd for being the conduit for so-called "Ascended Masters" to channel wisdom and warnings.

item.title: The Unexplained 14 - Michael Tellinger
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to author Michael Tellinger...
item.itunes:summary: This edition features best selling South African author Michael Tellinger with astonishing revelations about who we are and where we come from!

item.title: The Unexplained 13 - Jacky Newcomb
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to Jacky Newcomb...
item.itunes:summary: A world exclusive with Parnormal Researcher and Sunday Times Best Selling Writer Jacky Newcomb.

item.title: The Unexplained 12 - Major Ed Dames
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to remote viewer Major Ed Dames...
item.itunes:summary: The Unexplained checks in for an amazing update with world famous remote viewer Major Ed Dames.

item.title: The Unexplained 11 - Yvonne Smith
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to hypnotherapist Yvonne Smith...
item.itunes:summary: Howard talks with World-renowned alien abduction hypnotherapist Yvonne Smith.

item.title: The Unexplained 10 - Mark Turner
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to Mark Turner...
item.itunes:summary: This time we talk with Electronic Voice Phenomena researcher Mark Turner from the UKs EVP Research Association.

item.title: The Unexplained 9 - David Icke
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to David Icke...
item.itunes:summary: The first edition of The Unexplained for 2008 and it is a special with world famous British writer and visionary David Icke.

item.title: The Unexplained 8 - James Van Praagh
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to James Van Praagh...
item.itunes:summary: Globally renown American Medium Jame Van Praagh is in conversation with Howard about his life and how he has communicated with spirits including Marilyn Monroe.

item.title: The Unexplained 7 - Richard C Hoagland
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to space expert Richard C Hoagland...
item.itunes:summary: The Unexplained returns with a one hour interview with Richard C Hoagland, current author of the New York Times Best Seller Dark Mission.

item.title: The Unexplained 6 - Roswell Special Edition
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: An Unexplained Roswell UFO crash special edition...
item.itunes:summary: An Unexplained Special - We link up to Roswell - the site of the famous "UFO Crash" 60 years on.

item.title: The Unexplained 5
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: Howard Hughes talks to Major Ed Dames, Tony Buzan and Patrick Moore...
item.itunes:summary: In this episode Howard talks to Major Ed Dames, Tony Buzan and Patrick Moore.

item.title: The Unexplained 4
item.itunes:author: Howard Hughes
item.itunes:subtitle: The official podcast from Howard Hughes...
item.itunes:summary: The official podcast from Howard Hughes.

item.title: The Unexplained 1
